h2.span: Â Â Â Â Â Â

p.span: You may have already heard that Governor Ron DeSantis has called for all Florida school campuses to remain closed and for emergency distance learning plans to continue for the remainder of this school year.Â Please click on the Update as of April 18, 2020Â link above to read Superintendent Husfelt's message.
being our educational partners ... we know this is a stressful, challenging time for manyÂ of you (and for us) and we sincerely appreciate your support!

div.p: If you have any question not addressed in the weekly update, please refer to our FAQ document atÂ Â https://www.facebook.com/notes/bay-district-schools/bds-updates-32320/3220269021352477/Â or our website atÂ Â http://www.bay.k12.fl.us/COVID%2019

span.p: Â To maximize the safety of our employees, we are limiting bus distribution to M-W-F beginningÂ next week.Â Click on the MEALS link to see bus routes and more info.
